config Package¶

config Module¶

Seshat config for fla.gr Config settings

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

config.config.dummySession = False¶

Finally we need to define the base url for various things such as static assets and what not.

config.config.fcgiBase = ''¶

Next up, which address and port do we want the server to bind to this is the same for fastcgi or standalone gevent.

config.config.port = 8000¶

Next, do you want this framework to do some extra debugging?

config.config.securityLevels = ['normal', 'admin']¶

#########################STOP EDITING##################################### *WARNING* Don’t change these following settings unless you know what you’re doing!!! ##########################################################################

config.config.stderr = '/home/josh/repos/flagr/flagr_core/logs/error'¶

We need to make sure that the routing is taken care of properly. I’ll describe this setting later when I have more time.
